channel.title: How can i change item stats?
channel.description: how can i modify the bonus of my blue phat?

item.title: How can i change item stats?
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

go in item.cfg and look for this: item = 1042 Blue_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker. 1900000000 1900000000 1900000000 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10

and change all the 10’s in the (). () is just to show you which ones to change : example:

1042 Blue_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker. 1900000000 1900000000 1900000000 (10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10) change the 10’s to either 1000, or 10000

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change item stats?
